sentences.english: The nitrate ion has four fundamental modes of vibration .
sentences.chinese: 硝酸離子有四個基頻形式。

sentences.english: The beam quality of the frequency-doubled beam deteriorates seriously with the beam quality of basic frequency reducing.
sentences.chinese: 發現隨着基頻光束模式變差，倍頻光束質量嚴重惡化。

sentences.english: Conclusion The results suggested the hypertrophic ventricular fold disturbed the phonation , making the fundamental frequency lower.
sentences.chinese: 結論肥厚的室帶可能參與發音，使基頻和低音降低。

sentences.english: Orthonormal expansions at baseband and passband.
sentences.chinese: 基頻與通頻的正則擴大。

sentences.english: The new F0 extraction algorithm is evaluated on COSDIC speech database.
sentences.chinese: 該基頻提取算法在COSDIC數據庫上進行了測試。

sentences.english: I could do this. I could call this n equals one, the fundamental frequency.
sentences.chinese: 我可以這樣做，我將n等於，基頻。
